captions.text: Is that finished or not ?
Who are you ?
I’m an angel. The road angel.
But, what’s that ?
Oh this? It’s a spot. It appeared yesterday!
No, your halo! It is a strange one
This is because I am the ange who put gas ! But what happened to you on the road?
Curve, gas, full throttle, sliding, braking too late , I’am not a poof
You crazy. Do you know that last year, I received more than 800 bikers in heavens. Guys who got killed even under dry conditions and in open country.
Understand how to ride correctly in a curve.
OK, let’s start from the beginning. In such a curve, what do you do ?
I brake like a crazy dog and dive immediatly to the apex.
You've got the exact disease of many bikers. You go too early to the apex, you are stuck to it, you just can’t lean more or change anything in your trajectory.
When you open gas, you are outside of your lane, you are in a real danger.
Whereas me, I try to stay as long as possible on the outside of my lane before entering the curve to finally make turn my bike on its rush.
I go to the appex much later than you. When I open gas, I stay on my lane.
Did you understand ? Here is a little reward for you.
You know, I really like the bikers but they remain serious customers for me, responsible by one third of their own lethal accidents.
You know, the most important when you ride a bike, is your survival instinct. Think instead of others, be carefull instead of them, and anticipate, always.
Survival instinct, you should know about it ?
How to ride correctly in an hairpin.
Ok. How would you ride safely  in an hairpin ?
You’re just a dog of attack ! Once again, you go too early to the apex, you try to preserve some speed in the hairpin like in a normal curve.
And again you are outside of your lane when you try to accelerate with too much angle on the rear tire.
If there is a place where you can be a little bit outside of your lane, it is just when you brake before entering in the hairpin.
Because you’ve got the right visibility and you can modify your trajectory at any moment.
You will think about staying upright with your bike, to brake strongly upright, and almost stop your bike in the middle of the hairpin.
When you’ve gost the lowest speed, you make it turn by turning your head towards the inside of the hairpin.
You will come out of the hairpin with a minimum angle, being able to accelerate strongly without any risk. You are safe.
Oh
That’s OK, it’s just a spot. We’re not going to spend the complete day on it.
No, dear angel. Your halo is bliking !
Oh, it’s just because I just got an idea. You are funny with your small Yamaha WRF 450 and its 61 bhp
Do you know that in heavens, I use an R1. Would you like testing it ?
Oh yes, master, my master! Being able to accelerate stronger, brake harder and later. Oh yes, my master, an R1, pleeeeaaaaaaaaase !
Ok I’ll lend it to you. But first of all, I’ll learn you how to brake.
How to brake correctly on road.
Here is exactly a situation in which you are in a real danger. Being lend somebody’s else motorcycle or switching to a more powerfull model.
You arrive too fast in the curve, you get surprised because of the bike’s power, you brake hard, it locks your steering, you focus on the place where you are going to crash and it happens.
To brake correctly, you first have to move back on your seat. I am not sticked to the tank.
I will first use the rear brake to operate the mass transfer and stabilize the bike, and then only, I will brake strongly with my front brake.
But as soon as I get into the curve, I have to be able to open my hand and release the front brake to enter smoothly into the curve.
If I still get surprised by the speed, I still do have to release the front brake and watch inside the curve to make turn the bike.
If I still have too much speed in the curve, I can use the rear brake but only the rear to slow down the bike and move it towards the apex.
I can even lean the bike a little bit more without any risk.
You are a young crazy dog ? You just got your license. Oh, no, I know. You restart getting on a bike .
In  both cases, you’ve got to know that it takes time to regain confidence.
OK, I’ll give you one last advice, but I don’t want to see you in heavens. Never, ever. How do you enter in a blind curve ?
How to enter in a blind curve.
Before a blind curve, you need to place yourself to the maximum on the outside lane of the curve, just to widen your vision angle.
Can you see me ?
Outside of the lane, we can see him
Inside of the lane, we can’t see him.
Outside of the lane, we can see him
Inside of the lane, we can’t see him. But the car coming face to you, you discover it by the latest moment.
Am I doing good, dear angel ?
Not that bad, I think I can leave you riding alone now.
I saw the angle of road.
Images taken on private heavenly Road, and made by a professional Road Angel.
